solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean isSameTree(TreeNode p, TreeNode q) {--newline--        if(p == null && q == null) return true;--newline--        if(p == null || q == null) return false;--newline--        if(p.val == q.val)--newline--            return isSameTree(p.left, q.left) && isSameTree(p.right, q.right);--newline--        return false;--newline--    }--newline--}
